images.info: 1903 - First successful flight of the Wright Flyer, by the Wright brothers
images.title: Wright Brothers - First Flight

images.info: 1903 - Pierre and Maria Sk≈Çodowska-Curie in the laboratory, demonstrating the experimental apparatus used to detect the ionization of air
images.title: Pierre and Marie Curie win Nobel Prize in Physics

images.info: 1908 - Harry Houdini jumps from the Harvard Bridge, Boston, Masachusetts
images.title: Harry Houdini jumps from the Harvard Bridge

images.info: 1908 - National Phonograph Co.- Photo of pioneer recording vocal quartet, the 'Edison Quartet', also known as the Haydn Quartet.
images.title: Edison Quartet - Take Me Out To The Ball Game
